title: Cognitive Science-Based Short-Intensive Course for Improving Mathematics Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of high school-level mathematical concepts and data analysis experience in professional contexts
context.additional_context: Providing real-time interaction and personalized feedback via digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize three efficient strategies applying cognitive load theory when solving mathematical problems.
Learners can accurately diagnose their error patterns with over 80% precision based on formative assessment feedback.
Learners can systematically acquire five complex mathematical concepts over a week by applying spaced learning principles.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
